questionText: You are asking yourself whether Leo's top stopped spinning, when the professor asks you to answer a question that is significantly tougher. What do you do?

answerOptions.answerText: Panic, and leave the meeting that very instant.
Unmute yourself, and mimic TV static.
Unmute yourself, and truthfully admit you don't know shit.
Lie on the floor and play dead.

questionText: It’s your least favorite class at the end of the day. The professor starts talking but has forgotten to unmute themselves. What do you do?

answerOptions.answerText: Go with the flow and enjoy a nice nap
Say something like, "Ma’am, your audio isn’t visible"
Unmute and say, "The class has been canceled"
Leave and never return.

questionText: You had photoshopped an assignment, and the Professor finds out. What’s the best excuse?

answerOptions.answerText: Admit your mistake
Explain how EVERYONE'S assignments look exactly the same. That can't be a coincidence, right?
"Sir, why will I photoshop the assignment, it doesn’t get me any likes on Instagram!"
"Umm... we were twinning!"

questionText: It’s a two-hour long class. Choose a snack to go with it.

answerOptions.answerText: Popcorn
Bhel
Lay’s ke blue waale chips
Rich-people-pringles

questionText: How often have you been removed from a meeting?

answerOptions.answerText: More than 5 times.
Twice or thrice.
Once, but I was allowed back in.
Hawwww. Neverrr

questionText: How well do you remember your timetable?

answerOptions.answerText: I remind teachers to start the meeting.
I’m on time for most of them.
I’d be detained if my friends didn’t remind me of my classes.
Timetable? Are there timetables for online classes?

questionText: Choose your preferred method of attempting an online test.

answerOptions.answerText: 14 tabs for the 14 questions.
Study a little. 5 tabs for the rest.
Smash the phone-a-friend button.
Study diligently for each test. Never, ever cheat. Maa kasam

questionText: If all classes could have a background track, what would you choose?

answerOptions.answerText: Faded
Dynamite
Bachpan ka Pyaar (The original one, ofc)
Pyaar hume kis mod pe le aaya
